name: The Judge (Guszhii)
description:
To play this game you must have Gb-studio installed on your pc. 

1. Extract the zip file
2. Open "The judge Game" folder
3. Start "The judge Game" or "The judge Game.GBSPROJ" file

If windows ask how you want to open the file, just click "More apps", find Gb studio and open the file with that.

Good luck!

Download: https://chrismaltby.itch.io/gb-studio
